claims.claim: AI processing costs have significantly decreased
claims.quote: While AI processing costs have plummeted, some organizations are seeing massive monthly bills.

claims.claim: AI-driven tech operations can deliver improved efficiency and performance
claims.quote: A tech operation driven by AI can be leaner, faster and more adaptive

claims.claim: Mining company achieved supply chain improvements through AI approach
claims.quote: A global mining company sought to transform its inventory management practices. Using the IndustryAdvantage™ approach, they were able to improve supply chain reliability, achieve strategic alignment, and move from stockpiles to smart supplies.

claims.claim: AI solutions enable enhanced workforce planning and strategic alignment
claims.quote: Workforce Planner+ can help ensure accurate labor supply and demand analysis, enabling business leaders to enhance workforce planning and strategic alignment within their organizations.

claims.claim: AI helps organizations improve productivity and manage costs
claims.quote: This solution examines the impact of AI on workforce dynamics, helping organizations improve productivity, manage costs and encourage innovation.

claims.claim: AI enables exploration of opportunities for improved client relationships and revenue growth
claims.quote: helping organizations navigate AI integration challenges and explore opportunities for improved client relationships and revenue growth.

claims.claim: Organizations report measurable ROI from scaled GenAI initiatives
claims.quote: return on investment for organizations' most advanced (scaled) GenAI initiatives has been generally positive. Almost all organizations report measurable ROI, and almost a quarter (20%) report 31% or more.

claims.claim: Cybersecurity GenAI implementations exceed ROI expectations
claims.quote: Cybersecurity implementations have also emerged as a standout, with 44% saying ROI has surpassed their expectations, more than any other function.

claims.claim: Organizations expect to increase AI spending indicating positive value perception
claims.quote: a vast majority of respondents (78%) expect to increase their overall AI spending in the next fiscal year
